Name: Midnight Mysteries 4: Haunted Houdini
About the game: Famed illusionist Harry Houdini knew he wouldn’t escape death forever. When he promised his wife that he would try to reach her from the afterlife, it was seen as the ultimate stunt But after years of séances, Bess was never able to reach Harry in this life or the next, and her spirit has come to you in a final plea to reunite her with her partner! Digging deeper into Houdini’s past, you’ll find bitter rivalries and interview Harry’s closest friends and his staunchest critics. Consult famous friends like Sir Arthur Conan Doyle and rival Thurston the magician, while you solve puzzles and track Houdini’s ties to a super secret society. Help Bess and Harry reconnect in Midnight Mysteries: Haunted Houdini! Key Features: Complete all-new adventure missions by solving puzzles, interviewing apparitions from the past, and searching for tools through beautifully locations that crisscross the globe Illustrated strategy guide to help you tackle puzzles and make connections Intriguing mystery story
